title: Without Hope Of Help, Neighbors Turn To Makeshift Ebola Quarantine
teaser: In the Liberian capital of Monrovia, one community, without help from the government, set up their own quarantine of a family they believed to be infected with Ebola. For two weeks, the family grew sicker and sicker, until finally the ambulance arrived to take them to an isolation ward â€” but only after the teenage son had died.
